scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios --assets-dest ios
scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-* && yarn install && say Project has been cleaned successfully
